entry.title: Leon Brocard: YAPC::Asia
entry.summary: Miyagawa is currently talking about the plugin-full plagger (my favourite plugin is the Plagger::Plugin::Notify::Eject ;-). So far an excellent conference. Many thanks to the organisers! Now if only I can find some katsu curry...

entry.title: "The geek at your feet says you're neat..."

content.div: Lots of people were working on Plagger while Artur and I were working on DJabberd (sorry, no good website yet). We cleaned up the code a bunch, formalized the plugin system, added a bunch of new hooks, fixed a bunch of bugs, etc. ...

entry.title: [Lifehacks]PlaggerとbloglinesとGmailだとうっかり読み逃すことも
entry.summary: module: Subscription::Bloglines config: username: xxx password: xxx mark_read: 1 のように、mark_readを1にすると、plaggerがbloglinesにアクセスして取ってきた記事 を読んだことにする。これによって、Gmailに重複して送ることがなくなるわけだ。 ...
